summary: REQ-19 appears implemented by updating the centralized tagline in siteContent.ts; however REQ-20 is not implemented because no uploaded logo asset was added and there is no diff evidence that the header was switched to use IMG_4371-5.PNG-derived square logo across environments.

missing_requirements.requirement: Use the user-uploaded image IMG_4371-5.PNG as the site logo and ensure the header logo renders reliably across environments without falling back to the text-based placeholder.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows no new static asset added for the uploaded logo (Added: 0 files). There is also no code diff for SiteHeader to confirm the header was updated to use the uploaded image-derived asset and to avoid triggering the onError fallback in normal operation.
evidence: File diff summary: "Added: 0" (no new image asset added)
frontend-file-summaries.txt (describes logo path, but no actual asset addition or SiteHeader code diff is shown)

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state updates (project_state.json version/summary changes) not requested by the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest is narrowly scoped to tagline and logo updates; modifying project_state.json is not requested as part of requirements or acceptance criteria.

hallucinated_features.description: Updating/generated documentation-like file frontend-file-summaries.txt not requested by the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request adding or updating repository summary documentation files.
